item.title: IDC Business Value Study: A 306% ROI within 3 years using Ubuntu Linux on Azure
item.description: Study participants shared that Azure provides a more efficient and effective platform for their Ubuntu workloads, maximizing their value in core business functions and supporting new technology adoption. The post IDC Business Value Study: A 306% ROI within 3 years using Ubuntu Linux on Azure appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/idc-business-value-study-a-306-roi-within-3-years-using-ubuntu-linux-on-azure/
